content.title: Youth
content.description: Find out about youth ministry at The Meeting House.

image1.alt: Large group of youth having fun throwing powder paint in the air at a youth retreat.

content.text1: Our youth teams walk alongside the next generation in learning to love and follow Jesus, while equipping parents to disciple their youth at home.

content.header2: Scroll down to find a group near you
content.text1: Our program includes Jr High (grades 6-8) and Sr High (grades 9-12) with a mix of online and in-person events. We connect midweek to have fun, engage in small groups, and talk about Jesus.
